text: Daria Nicolodi (19 June 1950 â€“ 26 November 2020) was an Italian actress, producer and screenwriter. She was born in Florence, Italy. Her career began in 1970. Her best known roles were in Deep Red (1975), Inferno (1980), Tenebrae (1982), Phenomena (1985), and Opera (1987). From 1974 until 1985, she was in a relationship with Dario Argento. They had two children; including actress Asia Argento. Nicolodi died on 26 November 2020 in Rome at the age of 70.Addio a Daria Nicolodi, ex compagna di Dario Argento e star di Profondo Rosso ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Italian movie producers Category:Actors from Florence
title: Daria Nicolodi
